com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.geochart

Class GeoChartOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options.Options
        • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.geochart.GeoChartOptions

  • public class GeoChartOptions
extends Options
    Configuration options for GeoChart.
    See Also:
    Geo Chart Configuration Options

        public final void setDisplayMode(DisplayMode displayMode)
        Which type of geochart this is. The DataTable format must match the value specified.
        Parameters:
        displayMode -

      • setEnableRegionInteractivity

        public final void setEnableRegionInteractivity(boolean enableRegionInteractivity)
        If true, enable region interactivity, including focus and tool-tip elaboration on mouse hover, and region selection and firing of regionClick and select events on mouse click.
        The default is true in region mode, and false in marker mode.
        Parameters:
        enableRegionInteractivity -

      • setKeepAspectRatio

        public final void setKeepAspectRatio(boolean keepAspectRatio)
        If true, the geochart will be drawn at the largest size that can fit inside the chart area at its natural aspect ratio. If only one of the width and height options is specified, the other one will be calculated according to the aspect ratio.
        If false, the geochart will be stretched to the exact size of the chart as specified by the width and height options.
        Parameters:
        keepAspectRatio -

      • setLegend

        public final void setLegend(GeoChartLegend legend)
        An object with members to configure various aspects of the legend, or 'none', if no legend should appear.
        Parameters:
        legend -

      • setMagnifyingGlass

        Parameters:
        magnifyingGlass -

      • setMarkerOpacity

        public final void setMarkerOpacity(double markerOpacity)
        The opacity of the markers, where 0.0 is fully transparent and 1.0 is fully opaque.
        Parameters:
        markerOpacity -

      • setRegion

        public final void setRegion(String region)
        The area to display on the geochart. (Surrounding areas will be displayed as well.) Can be one of the following:
        • "world" - A geochart of the entire world.
        • A continent or a sub-continent, specified by its 3-digit code, e.g., "011" for Western Africa.
        • A country, specified by its ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code, e.g., "AU" for Australia.
        • A state in the United States, specified by its ISO 3166-2:US code, e.g., "US-AL" for Alabama. Note that the resolution option must be set to either PROVINCES or METROS.
        Parameters:
        region -

      • setResolution

        public final void setResolution(Resolution resolution)
        Sets the resolution of the geochart borders.
        Parameters:
        resolution -

      • setSizeAxis

        public final void setSizeAxis(SizeAxis sizeAxis)
        An object with members to configure how values are associated with bubble size.
        Parameters:
